historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-395.2.

Editor's Notes

Section 47-395.2 [1981 Ed.] had been amended by § 52(j) of D.C. Law 12-264; however, effect was given to the repeal by Pub. L. 106-1.

DC CODE § 47-395.02

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Budget and Financial Management; Borrowing; Deposit of Funds.
